verses.verse: Make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto the Lord <WH3068>, all you lands <WH776>.
Serve <WH5647> the Lord <WH3068> with gladness <WH8057>: come <WH935> before his presence <WH6440> with singing <WH7445>.
Know <WH3045> you that the Lord <WH3068> he is God <WH430>: it is he that has made <WH6213> us <WH5971>, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the sheep <WH6629> of his pasture <WH4830>.
Enter <WH935> into his gates <WH8179> with thanksgiving <WH8426>, and into his courts <WH2691> with praise <WH8416>: be thankful <WH3034> unto him <WH1288>, and bless his name <WH8034>.
For the Lord <WH3068> is good <WH2896>; his mercy <WH2617> is everlasting <WH5769>; and his truth <WH530> endures to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
